author: mininny
content:
Hi grandine team, I'm running devnets with the new devnet-6 branch, and I noticed that  data column sidecar verification requests sometimes surge a lot: http://94.130.19.237:3000/d/dsfasdfasf/network-monitor?orgId=1&from=2025-04-13T17:20:54.214Z&to=2025-04-13T22:44:46.740Z&timezone=utc&var-network=peerdas-devnet-ssl-15&var-consensus=$__all&var-execution=$__all&refresh=1m&editPanel=63 (from <1-2000 to 3 million)
At this time, grandine restarts due to stack overflow(https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1252403418941624532/1359508533099495556), and starts to sync back up to head. It seems, while trying to sync to head and get the blobs, it sends a lot of requests data column verification/processing. Higher request while syncing seems okay, but 3 million seems too high. I attached the log for that period as well.

author: hangleang.eth
content: Hi grandine team, I'm running devnets

author: mininny
content: I've also sent small changes to [prysm](https://github.com/OffchainLabs/prysm/pull/15168) and [geth](https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/go-ethereum/pull/64) for fixing getBlobsV2 payload naming. I think it wasn't working on the devnet-6 right now but will with this change
